message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.SY

This paper deals with distributed optimization algorithms for minimizing the average of heterogeneous functions, which is a common problem in machine learning. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses communication efficiency, which suggests that it could belong to cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). The use of adaptive sampling and estimation of local Lipschitz constants could also place it in cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the focus on convergence rate and acceleration could make it relevant to cs.SY (Systems and Control).
